task.title: How to Make Snow: Task Steps

step.cmd: Check the temperature and humidity and compare to a snowmaking chart to see if the weather conditions allow for snowmaking.
Check the oil and gas in the water pump to ensure it has enough of both to operate.
Attach hoses to air compressor, water pump, and snowmaker.

info.i: Ensure that hoses are not entangled.

step.cmd: Plug in and run the air compressor and water pump.
Completely open the air and water valves.

info.i: At the start of operation, allow excess ice to exit the snowmaker.
The water valve may need to be slowly shut to cut back on water intake if the snow appears to be too wet.
Switch out frozen hoses to allow the snowmaking process to continue without pause if the water or air hose appear constricted.

step.cmd: Monitor snow quality and adjust snowmaker position as it accumulates.
Transport snow to desired location and groom the trail.
